releases.highlights: Fixed machine research. Improved visualization of raw material input and consumption.

changes.text: Raw material input and consumption is now displayed in the factory and exploration tabs
It is now possible to target the research of required machines
Machines are now researchable again

releases.highlights: Significant game mechanics rebalance. New Solar Array design.

changes.text: Significantly rebalanced several mechanics of the game, including factory and map expansion, node unlocks, and research
Added very significant improvements to the balancing bot used to balance the game
New Solar Array design

releases.highlights: Added descriptions for items. Adjusted email format. New tick progress indicator with two gears.

changes.text: Added descriptions for items
Adjusted email format
New tick progress indicator with two gears

releases.highlights: Translations for French, German and Italian added. New Market tab and Research tab adjustments.

changes.text: New Market tab. Remade the layout, show more and more relevant information
Translations for French, German and Italian added.
Added automated unit tests, and end-to-end tests
Adjusted Research panel to more clearly show how many credits are being spent and how many remain

releases.highlights: Invite to Game. Huge performance improvements in Factory construction.

changes.text: Added Invite to Game feature.
Greatly improved performance when dragging machines and generators in the factory
Added precision assembler and electronics fab
Solved problem with nodes not being visible in the map even if there are recipes requiring those materials.
Added production deployment mechanism.
Significant rebalance of the game mechanics.
Added foundry and chemical plant

releases.highlights: Exploration map visual improvements. Factory layout redesign. User audit info.

changes.text: Exploration map is isometric again, and follows a different, more balanced generation pattern.
Changed main layout of the Factory tab
Added user audit session information
Unlocking researched recipes will now give additional research points, and also boost overall research production
Added steel forge, heavy assembly plant
Improved picking and dragging of buildings, now if two buildings are beside each other it works much more reliably, and with much greater performance.

releases.highlights: Asset loading visualization. New Factory layout. New power generators

changes.text: Added loading progress bar to the landing page
Changed main layout of the Factory tab
Added the diesel power plant, the solar array, and the nuclear reactor
Now recipes that require raw materials for the prototype can be unlocked (prototype will automatically receive the raw materials, if extraction nodes exist for it).
Added quick game tutorial, that appears when the user creates a new game
Added a tips mechanism that helps the user dynamically during the game. This will be expanded in subsequent releases
Added a feedback mechanism to allow users to send feedback to the developers
Authentication/first login has been improved. Now it doesn't require admin approval, and a wellcome email is automatically sent to the user.
Added external market dynamics. Improved market price history management.
Added thermal generator, windmill and coal power plant
New UI look&feel, with different colors. Added Game logo.
New research mechanic: Targetted experiment.
Research mechanic: Adjusted the way prototypes are built after the recipe has been unlocked.
Added badge to display pending recipes to unlock in Research tab.
Redesigned ground around factory.
Added fuel requirement to generators, and adjusted generators in general.
Materials will only be consumed once the prototype is built.
